name: Improvement
description:
Improvement is a space-shooter game that I am making for overcome the mid-development hell.

Things in game:

-Powerups

-Enemies

-Lives

-Sound

In development:

-Highscore

-GUI (better one)

-Challenges(removed)

-Boss Battle

-Menus

-Music

This game is under-development, so it CAN change eventually.

(only for windows)

sorry for my english [I am from Brazil]
